product_name: Vittoria Cross XG Pro Foldable Tire - 700 x 34
long_description: Ready for the mud and muck of cyclocross, the Vittoria Cross XG Pro foldable clincher tire offers great all-around traction for your muddy endeavors. Supple 150 tpi casing is backed with a puncture-resistant belt to increase the chances that your race won't end prematurely because of a puncture. Widely spaced tread pattern easily clears mud and grass to supply maximum traction and control; tacky rubber compound handles well in all conditions. Recommended pressure for the Vittoria Cross XG Pro foldable clincher tire is 60 - 90 psi (4 - 6 BAR).
short_description: Ready for the mud and muck of cyclocross, the Vittoria Cross XG Pro foldable clincher tire offers great all-around traction for your muddy endeavors.
